imdb.plot outline: La Vega is a television documentary-style reality show that addresses the worrisome phenomenon of young people who don't want to study or work. To their parents, this is a problem that seems to have no solution, and which gradually begins to wear out intra-family relationships, as well as placing a burden on their household's economy. The show subjects these young people to an unprecedented and extreme experience in which they must carry out diverse and sacrificed work activities in the place in Chile where people work the hardest: at Santiago's main produce and provisions market, La Vega Central.
imdb.title: La Vega
plot: _La Vega_ (qv) is a television documentary-style reality show that addresses the worrisome phenomenon of young people who don't want to study or work. To their parents, this is a problem that seems to have no solution, and which gradually begins to wear out intra-family relationships, as well as placing a burden on their household's economy. The show subjects these young people to an unprecedented and extreme experience in which they must carry out diverse and sacrificed work activities in the place in Chile where people work the hardest: at Santiago's main produce and provisions market, _La Vega_ (qv) Central.::Fabula
